bill.title: Rejecting anti-Israel and anti-Semitic hatred in the United States and around the world.
bill.description: This resolution rejects anti-Israel and anti-Semitic hatred in the United States and around the world.

committee.name: Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

history.action: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
